sentences.sContent: Both the model and the satellite sensor use infrared energy to measure clouds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Both the model and the satellite sensor use infrared energy to measure clouds.
sentences.sCn: 模型和卫星传感器都使用红外能量来进行云的估算。

sentences.sContent: "This is an exciting result, " says Tinetti. "This is the first near-infrared spectrum of a planet.
sentences.sContent_eng: "This is an exciting result, " says Tinetti. "This is the first near-infrared spectrum of a planet.
sentences.sCn: 迪奈蒂说：“这是个令人兴奋的结果，这是行星上发现的第一个近红外光谱。

sentences.sContent: His discovery of the electromagnetic spectrum led to the development of television, radio, microwaves, as well as aiding in the development of radio and infrared telescopes.
sentences.sContent_eng: His discovery of the electromagnetic spectrum led to the development of television, radio, microwaves, as well as aiding in the development of radio and infrared telescopes.
sentences.sCn: 他发现的电磁特性最终导致电视、广播、微波炉的发明，并且也对无线电和红外望远镜的发明起到了重要作用。

phrases.pCn: 红外光谱法；红外线分光镜
红外吸收；红外线吸收作用
傅里叶变换红外光谱学
红外测温仪；红外线温度计
红外线激光器；红外雷射

trans.tranOther: Infrared radiation is similar to light but has a longer wavelength, so we cannot see it without special equipment
